bibl.title: Manuscripts with the Lord's Prayer - They are more than Simply Witnesses to that Text itself.

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.title: New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World
bibl.author: KRAUS, Thomas J.

bibl.note: 1. Some Preliminary Notes on the Purpose of this Essay. - 2. Manuscripts with the Lord's Prayer (without a Gregory-Aland Number): 2.1. A compilation in list form [Nos 1-19]; - 2.2. Some summarizing remarks on the manuscripts of the Lord's Prayer. - 3. More than Simply a Witness to the Text of the Lord's Prayer: An Assessment of P. Princ. II, 107 [= van Haelst 967] = Suppl. Mag. I, 29 as a Model.
KRAUS Thomas J., Manuscripts with the Lord's Prayer - They are more than Simply Witnesses to that Text itself.
Thomas J. KRAUS and Tobias NICKLAS (Edd.), New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World = Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 2 (Leiden - Boston, 2006) pp. 227-266, 8 figg.
